pkgmetadata.longdescription: The amdgpu-drm is a virtual ebuild. It will make sure that amdgpu drm module is compatible or have available the ioctls for both kernel and userspace drivers.

use.flag: Prefer the DKMS drivers. The driver will be built as modules.

Selects the in kernel sources which will contain the amdgpu DRM driver.
(Recommended for minimal install and better security)

Selects rock-dkms as the DRM driver
(Recommended for feature completeness)
Both the firmware and DRM driver are paired so they coinside, meaning the 20.40 driver matches the corresponding the 20.40 firmware.
